name: driveway
story: You are standing on the driveway of Christine's house. The tiniest, most pathetic dog you've ever seen appears and begins to follow you everywhere.
nav: Where do you want to go: Garage [1], Front Porch [2], Patio [3]

name: garage
story: You enter the garage. What a mess. Looks like someone forgot to clean up.
nav: Where do you want to go: Driveway[1], Front Porch [2], Mudroom [3]

name: porch
story: You are on the front porch. All the plants are dead. If you could find a hose, it wouldn't matter, that's how dead they are.
nav: Where do you want to go: Driveway [1], Garage [2], Front Entrance [3]

name: mudroom
story: You enter the mudroom. There is a pile of laundry on top of the dryer.
nav: Where do you want to go: Garage [1], Kitchen [2], Patio [3]

name: front_entrance
story: You are in the front entrance. Watch out for all of the shoes. Obviously no one knows how to put anything away.
nav: Where do you want to go: Front Porch [1], Living Room [2], Attic [3]

name: living_rm
story: You enter the living room. The TV is blaring Disney Plus. Funny, there is no one in the living room watching the TV.
nav: Where do you want to go: Front Entrance [1], Office [2], Kitchen [3]

name: office
story: You enter the office. There is a picture of a snake on the wall with darts in it...wait, is that a Python?
nav: Where do you want to go: Living Room [1], Dining Room [2], Attic [3]

name: dining_rm
story: You enter the dining room. The table is piled high with everything except dishes. You wonder where these people eat.
nav: Where do you want to go: Office [1], Pantry [2], Downstairs Hallway [3]

name: kitchen
story: You are in the kitchen. Something smells really good. The sink looks backed up.
nav: Where do you want to go: Mudroom [1], Living Room [2], Pantry [3]

name: pantry
story: You enter the pantry. You wonder how many boxes of KD does one family REALLY need!
nav: Where do you want to go: Dining Room [1], Kitchen [2], Downstairs Hallway [3]

name: hallway
story: You are in the downstairs hall, it's full of shoes. How many shoes do these people need?
nav: Where do you want to go: Dining Room [1], Pantry [2], Upstairs [3]

name: upstairs_east_hall
story: You are in the upstairs east hallway. Why are there 23 hockey sticks in the corner?
nav: Where do you want to go: Downstairs [1}, West Hallway [2], Third Bedroom [3]

name: upstairs_west_hall
story: You are in the upstairs west hallway. There's a basket of laundry in the corner.
nav: Where do you want to go: East Hallway [1], Master Bedroom [2], Second Bedroom [3]

name: master_bdrm
story: You enter the master bedroom. At least the bed is made, but there is laundry everywhere.
nav: Where do you want to go: West Hallway [1], Master Bath [2], Walk-in Closet [3]

name: bedroom_two
story: You enter a bedroom. You step on a piece of Lego and experience what might possibly be the most escruating pain know to mankind.
nav: Where do you want to go: West Hallway [1], Master Bedroom [2], Second Bathroom [3]

name: bedroom_three
story: You enter a bedroom. From the smell, you can only imagine it must belong to a teenage boy (or there's something dead in the closet).

name: master_bath
story: You are in the master bathroom. Someone has drawn a bath, the water is ice cold. The sink looks backed up.
nav: Where do you want to go: Master Bedroom [1], Walk-in Closet [2]

name: second_bathroom
story: You are in the second bathroom. OMG!! How could such a small space be so dirty? The sink looks backed up.
nav: Where do you want to go: Second Bedroom [1], Third Bedroom [2]

name: walk_in_closet
story: You enter the walk-in closet. You see a chair with candy wrappers strewn about...weird.
nav: Where do you want to go: Master Bedroom [1], Master Bath [2]

name: attic
story: You are in the attic. There are boxes stacked on top of boxes and so much dust you can write your name.
nav: Where do you want to go: Front Entrance [1], Office [2], Third Bedroom [3]

name: patio
story: You are out on the patio. There is a BBQ...but no propain tank.
nav: Where do you want to go: Driveway [1], Mudroom [2], Garden Shed [3]

name: yard
story: You are in the backyard. The grass is so long. The tiny dog runs off into the grassâ€¦you think she might be lost forever.
nav: Where do you want to go: Garden Shed [1], Pool House [2], Pool [3]

name: shed
story: You enter the garden shed. The lawn mower is in pieces. You're thankful because you know Christine can't ask you to mow the grass.
nav: Where do you want to go: Patio [1], Backyard [2]

name: pool_house
story: You enter the pool house. Look at that, there's a whole rack of swimsuits.

name: pool
story: You are standing at the edge of the pool. A giant inflated flamingo is floating around...no one is in it.
nav: Where do you want to go: Backyard [1], Pool House [2]
